profile.name: RahulAI
profile.title: Full Stack Developer & AI Specialist
profile.summary: Experienced developer specializing in AI-powered web applications and modern web technologies. Currently exploring opportunities in Europe and actively learning German.

projects.title: RahulAI Portfolio
projects.description: A personalized AI-powered portfolio website that showcases projects and skills through an interactive chat interface.
highlights: Interactive AI chat assistant with markdown support

projects.title: Animal Identification - Mice Classification
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model using YOLOv8 to distinguish between dotted and striped mice. Extracted and labeled image data from video, optimizing model performance through rigorous training.
highlights: Achieved high accuracy, contributing valuable tools for biological research and wildlife monitoring

experience.description: Gathered and prepared visual data from movie clips, developed and trained custom object detection models using YOLO, and optimized model performance for accuracy and efficiency.
achievements: Utilized Roboflow for data augmentation and model management

experience.description: Led cross-functional AI initiatives, conducted market research, and applied data analysis to enhance operations and make informed decisions.
achievements: Excelled in B2C e-commerce by applying data analysis

experience.description: Leading development of AI-powered web applications and portfolio websites.
achievements: Implemented AI chat interfaces for multiple client projects
Reduced development time by 40% through AI automation
Mentored junior developers in AI integration
Led team of 5 developers on major client projects

experience.description: Developed and maintained enterprise web applications.

education.institution: IU International University of Applied Sciences
education.details: Focused on developing advanced AI models and gaining practical experience through industry projects.
